title: Resale E-commerse Site
details: E-MOBO is a resale ecommerse site where you can purchase any resale mobile phone

feature.f1: The site is built with three types of users, 1. buyer, 2. seller, and 3. admin.
feature.f2: Admin can manage all the buyers and sellers and also verify sellers.
feature.f3: Seller can post and advertise products that buyers can purchase by payment using stripe.
feature.f4: It is full responsive using tailwind and routing functionality all over the website.
feature.f5: website has a blog page and where you can see leatest blog on interesting topics.

Technologies: React.JS, Express.JS, Firebase, REST API, tailwind, ES6, Mongo DB, JWT etc

title: Event Management Site
details: DEVENTS is an event management site where you can hire a proffesional photographer

feature.f1: The website is fully responsive with bootstrap
feature.f2: You can hire an experienced photographer for your specific event from services.
feature.f3: Customers can add any specific reviews according to any service.
feature.f4: Without login a user can't add his own review but can see any service review
feature.f5: website has a blog page and where you can see leatest blog on interesting topics.

Technologies: React.JS, Express.JS, Firebase, REST API, Bootstrap, ES6, Mongo DB, JWT etc.

title: E-Learning Platform
details: Skill Edge is an E-learning website where you can purchase any course to improve skills.

feature.f1: The Website is fully responsive using bootstrap
feature.f2: Any users can log in and purchase a course.
feature.f3: It also comes with a modern UI design with both dark and light modes.
feature.f4: Without login a user can't enters to the checkout and user profile pages.
feature.f5: You can update your profile information from profile section.

Technologies: React.JS, Express.JS, Firebase, bootstrap, ES6, Git, REST API, Vercel.

title: Appoinment Management Web App
details: AnyCare is a pet appointment scheduling website where you can schedule a appointment to experts.

feature.f1: The Website is fully responsive using tailwind.
feature.f2: Visitors need to be login for appoinment schedule .
feature.f3: After booked a Schedule, User can cancel or reschedule it.
feature.f4: There's an admin panel where admin can manage users and all the appoinments.
feature.f5: Admin can make any user to admin.

Technologies: React.JS, Express.JS, Firebase, Tailwind, ES6, GitHub, REST API, Vercel, JWT etc
